column5: The Old Parsonage is located in Seabrook, half way between Houston and Galveston! There are plenty of family-friendly activities just over the bridge at the Kemah Boardwalk and down the road at Space Center Houston! We are nestled a block away from the water in Old Seabrook, there are several great restaurants within walking distance including one of Houston's most famous burger joints, Tookies, the new Tookies Seafood, Gourmet Desserts at The Seabrook Waffle Company!
